instructions: Sign in to your Google Admin console . Sign in using your administrator account (does not end in @gmail.com). From the Admin console Home page, go to Devices . On the left, click Android Settings . (Optional) On the left, select the organizational unit to which you want to apply the settings. Select a category and next to the setting, check the box to apply it. For details about each setting, see below. After you make a change, click Save .
